availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William H. Rice (Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Elizabeth Keith Stephens Rice in Ohio County, Kentucky, on October 9, 1856. Father of Martha E. Rice, Winfield W. Rice, and Cicero S. Rice. Farmer in Ohio County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio County, Caney, p. 728.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, X County Marriages, Film #000494956, p. 61.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Ohio County Wills, vol. A-D, 1801-1912, p. 326.
